Variable Fonts Experiments

This is a reminder for myself in the future that all the work that Mandy Michael has been doing with variable fonts is remarkable and showcases what’s possible if we start to push the web into a weird place with fonts.

See the Pen Corgo's with Jason by Mandy Michael (@mandymichael) on CodePen.
